title: Rex Ryan, MNF, College Football Round Up & Guys On Chicks
description:
Monday Night Football recap and the Cowboys could be good? (00:02:38 - 00:13:04) Tying up loose ends from Sunday and we talk College Football in preparation for a huge Saturday (00:13:04 - 00:30:55). Hot Seat/Cool Throne including Joe West retirement and new Larry shirts (00:30:55 - 00:51:05). Rex Ryan joins the show to talk football, his coaching days, what makes a defense great, and his love for his wifeâ€™s feet (00:51:05 - 01:29:43). We finish the show with guys on chicks


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
